text: I agree this game was terrible difficult. I think the designers also thought so. And they created LTTP, one of my favorite games. Favorite is OOT. text:
I liked this game, i was a huge fan of the first Zelda, the second was different, and it was difficult! ... arggg. I liked it! I like a game thats a challenge, only when I am in the mood! I finished the game (only lucky too to use the use the trick at the last boss, without reading the magazines!)  But I liked it when they continued the design from the 1e
LTP is one of my favorites!

text:
